settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the "Complete Orders" link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

settings.text: 3-year Warranty. With Blacklyte's Warranty Coverage, You Can Shop With Peace of Mind.
Easy & Safe Installation. We Prioritize Simplicity, Ensuring a Hassle-free Experience.

custom_css: .product-customInformation__icon svg {fill: none; stroke: none; vertical-align: middle;}

settings.bundle_discount_text: Get a [discount]% discount buying these products together

settings.image_banner_title: Atlas Desk: Redefining Work and Entertainment Experience
settings.image_banner_des: The Atlas Desk is a cutting-edge adjustable standing desk that offers an unbeatable immersive work and entertainment experience.

custom_css: .wrapper-image {max-width: 74px; height: 74px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;}

settings.title: Intelligent Lighting Integration
settings.des: The desktop features embedded smart light strips and a controller that supports multi-color mode switching. It can sync with PC programs and match gaming algorithms to enhance gaming experience.

settings.title: Patented Cable Management
settings.des: Patented internal cable management design with fully integrated power columns keeps the desk legs tidy and clutter-free.

settings.title: Modular RGB Lighting
settings.des: The magnetic triangular light with a collision-resistant structure and built-in RGB fantasy LED lights supports 1600W true color display, offering a stunning visual experience.

settings.heading: Sync and Adjust Your Atlas Desk Lighting

settings.text: Get the Atlas Desk driver to enable dynamic lighting effects and customize brightness for an optimal experience.

settings.image_banner_des: Equipped with a large-capacity cable management box with a flip-top structure for secure and reliable cable storage.

settings.heading: Smooth Dual-Motor Adjustment
settings.text: The desk legs utilize high-precision dual motors for smooth and stable height adjustments, ranging from 72 to 137cm, catering to diverse needs.

settings.image_banner_des: Crafted from automotive-grade cold-rolled steel, the desk legs offer exceptional load-bearing capacity and stability, ensuring a solid, wobble-free experience.

settings.heading: Ergonomic Memory Control
settings.text: The height-adjustable controller features 2 memory presets, allowing effortless and continuous adjustment to alleviate lumbar strain caused by prolonged sitting, inspiring instant creativity.

settings.heading: Obstacle Rebound Safety
settings.text: Designed with obstacle rebound protection for added safety, ensuring automatic retraction upon encountering resistance during height adjustment.

custom_css: .spotlight-inner .spotlight-button.custom-button-style {border: none; display: flex; flex-direction: row-reverse; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-weight: 400; opacity: 1;}

settings.heading: Magnetic Gaming Desk
settings.text: Our gaming desk features a magnetic iron-clad density board, supporting attachments like magnetic cable organizers, desk mats and mouse pads for a tidy setup.

settings.heading: Effortless Magnetic Corner Light for Immersive Experience
settings.text: The Atlas desk features a magnetic corner light with easy installation, offering an immersive experience with built-in RGB LEDs. Its collision-proof design ensures safety and durability, enhancing both functionality and style in your gaming space.

settings.heading: Wire Wrangler Tray
settings.text: Bid farewell to cable chaos as you seamlessly guide all your wires into the Wire Wrangler Tray. This innovative tray also incorporates a power supply, providing a convenient hub to plug in your devices. That's the epitome of innovation!

settings.heading: Single Concealed Power Supply Column
settings.text: The built-in power system of the Atlas Desk discreetly employs a sole hidden cable running through the desk leg, connecting seamlessly to an internal electrical socket. This setup empowers both your desk and devices simultaneously.

settings.heading: How do IÂ track my order?
settings.content: Once your order ships, you'll receive a shipping confirmation email and tracking number, so you can follow your package as it makes its way to you. However, tracking information can take up to 24 hours to update, so donâ€™t worry if it doesn't show up immediately. We recommend tracking your order and ensuring that youâ€™re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: When will my order be shipped?
settings.content: Â Inventory orders are typically shipped the next business day and will be delivered within 1-5 business days. Â For more information, please check ourÂ Shipping and Return Policy.

settings.heading: My order has been shipped. Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.content: Unfortunately, we are unable to cancel your order once it ships.

settings.heading: Can I exchange my orderï¼Ÿ
settings.content: For the most efficient resolution to obtain the item you desire, we recommend returning the original item. Once your return is approved, we encourage you to proceed with a separate purchase for the new item. Â For more information, please check ourÂ Return & Refund Policy.

settings.heading: How will my order be delivered?
settings.content: We deliver your order straight to your address via FedEx & Canada Post. Youâ€™ll receive an email with a tracking number when your order ships, so you can easily track your order. Please ensure that youâ€™re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: What do I do if I face an issue with my purchase?
settings.content: In the unlikely event that you come across any damaged, defective or missing parts, please contact us at support@blacklyte.com with a photo of the affected area and your order number. Our support specialists will do their best to assist you.
